title: Red Wire
subtitle: Realtime AI Ops Platform
tagline: A cloud-native, event-driven, AI-augmented realtime platform
tech_stack_subtitle: Every technology introduced for a clear architectural reason, at the moment where it becomes necessary
tech_nextjs_desc: Rendering & delivery with Server-Side Rendering and clear separation between server and client components
tech_tanstack_desc: Client-side async state orchestrator for cache normalization, optimistic updates and realtime data evolution
tech_shadcn_desc: Fully composable UI components with accessibility via Radix, perfect for modern Next.js apps
tech_fastify_desc: High performance Node.js backend with excellent plugin system and native WebSocket support
tech_cognito_desc: Enterprise-grade identity management with OAuth2, JWT and refresh tokens
tech_kafka_desc: Event streaming for multiple consumers, replayability and loose coupling between domain and side effects
tech_postgres_desc: Clear relational modeling with Aurora compatibility for production scalability
tech_ai_desc: Event summarization, anomaly detection and ChatOps assistant - AI as augmentation, never as source of truth
tech_observability_desc: Sentry for error tracking, Prometheus + Grafana for metrics, structured logs for debugging
current_project_desc: This is my ongoing personal project designed to keep me on track and up-to-date with cutting-edge technologies in the market.
learning_journey_desc: This project demonstrates senior-level architectural decisions and modern development practices.
boundaries_desc: Between rendering, orchestration, and domain logic
roadmap_desc: Seven milestones to demonstrate modern system design
milestone_1_desc: Next.js App Router, shadcn/ui design system, TanStack Query, and mock APIs with fake latency
milestone_2_desc: Fastify API, PostgreSQL database, RBAC & permissions
milestone_3_desc: WebSockets, optimistic UI, and conflict awareness
milestone_4_desc: Kafka topics & consumers, audit logs, and side-effect isolation
milestone_5_desc: LLM service, event summaries, and ChatOps assistant
milestone_7_desc: Sentry, Prometheus/Grafana, and load & failure testing

github_desc: Explore the source code, follow development progress, and see the architectural decisions in action
